title: Equites
description: While the Equites continue to hold off attacks from the other factions, Emily is in a life-threatening accident that draws suspicions of the Valle. Another Winchester heir causes tension in the Equites, and an uprising brings Emily under the protection of Damon. After her return from abroad, Emily becomes elusive and quiet in the city. Allen's full abilities come to light and he begins meshing himself with the heku. Personal attacks by enemy factions force Emily to take radical measures and she offers the heku an ultimatum that could bring peace.
author: T.M. Nielsen
